description.scarlet-violet: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

effect.full: Tachyon Cutter inflicts damage, hitting twice per use. It bypasses accuracy checks to always hit, unless the target is in the semi-invulnerable turn of a move such as Dig or Fly. If used by a Pok√©mon with Sharpness, its power is increased by 50%.
